Browse the source code of netbsd/crypto/external/bsd/heimdal/dist/lib/krb5/prompter_posix.c

36#include "krb5_locl.h"
37
38KRB5_LIB_FUNCTION int KRB5_CALLCONV
39krb5_prompter_posix (krb5_context context,
40 void *data,
41 const char *name,
42 const char *banner,
43 int num_prompts,
44 krb5_prompt prompts[])
45{
46 int i;
47
48 if (name)
49 fprintf (stderr, "%s\n", name);
50 if (banner)
51 fprintf (stderr, "%s\n", banner);
52 if (name || banner)
53 fflush(stderr);
54 for (i = 0; i < num_prompts; ++i) {
55 if (prompts[i].hidden) {
56 if(UI_UTIL_read_pw_string(prompts[i].reply->data,
57 prompts[i].reply->length,
58 prompts[i].prompt,
59 0))
60 return 1;
61 } else {
62 char *s = prompts[i].reply->data;
63
64 fputs (prompts[i].prompt, stdout);
65 fflush (stdout);
66 if(fgets(prompts[i].reply->data,
67 prompts[i].reply->length,
68 stdin) == NULL)
69 return 1;
70 s[strcspn(s, "\n")] = '\0';
71 }
72 }
73 return 0;
74}
